description: On New Year's Eve, I challenged Manuel Deboxer to strip naked in my kitchen and cum in my glass before midnight, while friends were partying in the next room. He accepted on one condition: I had to drink it afterwards. I was very happy to accepted this condition! We both met our challenges. It also meant that, Manuel had the first cum of the New Year! What a  wonderful way to say goodbye to 2015 and welcome 2016!
series: First Cum of the New Year
title: First Cum of the New Year, Scene #01
